headline: KKR nears deal to buy OSTTRA for about $3 billion, Bloomberg News reports
summary: U.S.-based private equity firm KKR is nearing a deal to buy OSTTRA for about $3 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter. The deal could be...
